channel.title: Life Style on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Life Style on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Facebook Mess
item.description: This year I noticed that my Facebook had become high-jacked by viral-videos, Upworthy-style misleading article titles and pictures of very small houses. I have a few specific functions I want Facebook to perform for me in this order. Keep up to date with the major and minor life changes of a broad group of associates I wouldnâ€™t otherwise keep in touch with. I think of loose friends from college, high school friends, family friends, etc.
